name: Smash Overdrive
description:
The theme for the Mix and Game Jam was "Dimension Change"; Take a game mechanic and alter it to fit another dimension.

My entry takes Super Smash Bros, from a Side Scrolling Platformer to an Isometric Platformer. It's my first game jam, and I'm proud that I put 30+ hours over the span of 2 days. It was fun.

NOTE

It is multiplayer, so you'll need a friend.
